sections.name: minecraft:behavior.nearest_attackable_target
content: Allows an entity to attack the closest target within a given subset of specific target types.

rows.Name: attack_interval|attack_interval_min
rows.Description: Time range (in seconds) between searching for an attack target, range is in (0, "attack_interval"]. Only used if "attack_interval" is greater than 0, otherwise "scan_interval" is used.

rows.Name: attack_owner
rows.Description: If true, this entity can attack its owner.

rows.Name: entity_types
rows.Description: Filters which types of targets are valid for this entity.

rows.Name: must_reach
rows.Description: If true, this entity requires a path to the target.

rows.Name: must_see
rows.Description: Determines if target-validity requires this entity to be in range only, or both in range and in sight.

rows.Name: must_see_forget_duration
rows.Description: Time (in seconds) the target must not be seen by this entity to become invalid. Used only if "must_see" is true.

rows.Name: persist_time
rows.Description: Time (in seconds) this entity can continue attacking the target after the target is no longer valid.

rows.Name: reselect_targets
rows.Description: Allows the attacking entity to update the nearest target, otherwise a target is only reselected after each "scan_interval" or "attack_interval".

rows.Name: scan_interval
rows.Description: If "attack_interval" is 0 or isn't declared, then between attacks: scanning for a new target occurs every amount of ticks equal to "scan_interval", minimum value is 1. Values under 10 can affect performance.

rows.Description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

rows.Description: Maximum vertical target-search distance, if it's greater than the target type's "max_dist". A negative value defaults to "entity_types" greatest "max_dist".

rows.Name: target_sneak_visibility_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplied with the target type's "max_dist" when trying to detect a sneaking target.

rows.Name: burst_shots
rows.Description: Number of shots fired every time the attacking entity uses a charged up attack.

rows.Name: charge_charged_trigger
rows.Description: Time (in seconds, then add "charge_shoot_trigger"), before a charged up attack is done charging. Charge-time decays while target is not in sight.

rows.Name: charge_shoot_trigger
rows.Description: Amount of time (in seconds, then doubled) a charged shot must be charging before reloading burst shots. Charge-time decays while target is not in sight.

rows.Name: ranged_fov
rows.Description: Field of view (in degrees) when using sensing to detect a target for attack.

rows.Name: set_persistent
rows.Description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: During attack behavior, this multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving toward the target.

rows.Name: swing
rows.Description: If a swing animation (using variable.attack_time) exists, this causes the actor to swing their arm(s) upon firing the ranged attack.

rows.Name: target_in_sight_time
rows.Description: Minimum amount of time (in seconds) the attacking entity needs to see the target before moving toward it.

rows.Name: x_max_rotation
rows.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

rows.Name: y_max_head_rotation
rows.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.receive_love
content: Allows the villager to stop so another villager can breed with it. Can only be used by a Villager.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.restrict_open_door
content: Allows the mob to stay indoors during night time.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.restrict_sun
content: Allows the mob to automatically start avoiding the sun when its a clear day out.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.rise_to_liquid_level
content: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.

rows.Name: liquid_y_offset
rows.Description: Target distance down from the liquid surface. i.e. Positive values move the target Y down.

rows.Name: rise_delta
rows.Description: Movement up in Y per tick when below the liquid surface.

rows.Name: sink_delta
rows.Description: Movement down in Y per tick when above the liquid surface.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.roar (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows this entity to roar at another entity based on data in minecraft:anger_level. Once the anger threshold specified in minecraft:anger_level has been reached, this entity will roar for the specified amount of time, look at the other entity, apply anger boost towards it, and finally target it.

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: The amount of time to roar for.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.roll
content: This allows the mob to roll forward.

rows.Name: probability
rows.Description: The probability that the mob will use the goal.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.run_around_like_crazy
content: Allows the mob to run around aimlessly.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.scared
content: Allows the a mob to become scared when the weather outside is thundering

rows.Name: sound_interval
rows.Description: The interval in which a sound will play when active in a 1/delay chance to kick off

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.send_event
content: Allows the mob to send an event to another mob.

rows.Name: cast_duration
rows.Description: Time in seconds for the entire event sending process

rows.Name: look_at_target
rows.Description: If true, the mob will face the entity it sends an event to

rows.Name: sequence
Description: List of events to send

rows.Name: base_delay
rows.Description: Amount of time in seconds before starting this step

rows.Name: event
rows.Description: The event to send to the entity

rows.Name: sound_event
rows.Description: The sound event to play when this step happens

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.share_items
content: Allows the mob to give items it has to others.

rows.Name: entity_types
Description: List of entities this mob will share items with

rows.Name: cooldown
rows.Description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

rows.Name: max_dist
rows.Description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

rows.Name: must_see
rows.Description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

rows.Name: must_see_forget_duration
rows.Description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

rows.Name: reevaluate_description
rows.Description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

rows.Name: sprint_speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

rows.Name: walk_speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

rows.Name: goal_radius
rows.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

rows.Name: max_dist
rows.Description: Maximum distance in blocks this mob will look for entities to share items with

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.silverfish_merge_with_stone
content: Allows the mob to go into stone blocks like Silverfish do. Currently it can only be used by Silverfish.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.silverfish_wake_up_friends
content: Allows the mob to alert mobs in nearby blocks to come out. Currently it can only be used by Silverfish.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.skeleton_horse_trap
content: Allows Equine mobs to be Horse Traps and be triggered like them, spawning a lightning bolt and a bunch of horses when a player is nearby. Can only be used by Horses, Mules, Donkeys and Skeleton Horses.

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: Amount of time in seconds the trap exists. After this amount of time is elapsed, the trap is removed from the world if it hasn't been activated

rows.Name: within_radius
rows.Description: Distance in blocks that the player has to be within to trigger the horse trap

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.sleep
content: Allows mobs that own a bed to in a village to move to and sleep in it.

rows.Name: can_sleep_while_riding
rows.Description: If true, the mob will be able to use the sleep goal if riding something

rows.Name: cooldown_time
rows.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

rows.Name: sleep_collider_height
rows.Description: The height of the mob's collider while sleeping

rows.Name: sleep_collider_width
rows.Description: The width of the mob's collider while sleeping

rows.Name: sleep_y_offset
rows.Description: The y offset of the mob's collider while sleeping

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

rows.Name: timeout_cooldown
rows.Description: The cooldown time in seconds before the goal can be reused after a internal failure or timeout condition

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.slime_attack (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Causes the entity to grow tired every once in a while, while attacking.

rows.Name: set_persistent
rows.Description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: During attack behavior, this multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving toward the target.

rows.Name: x_max_rotation
rows.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

rows.Name: y_max_rotation
rows.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.slime_float (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allow slimes to float in water / lava. Can only be used by Slime and Magma Cubes.

rows.Name: jump_chance_percentage
rows.Description: Percent chance a slime or magma cube has to jump while in water / lava.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving through water / lava.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows the entity to continuously jump around like a slime.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Determines the multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when jumping around.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.slime_random_direction (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows the entity to move in random directions like a slime.

rows.Name: add_random_time_range
rows.Description: Additional time (in whole seconds), chosen randomly in the range of [0, "add_random_time_range"], to add to "min_change_direction_time".

rows.Name: min_change_direction_time
rows.Description: Constant minimum time (in seconds) to wait before choosing a new direction.

rows.Name: turn_range
rows.Description: Maximum rotation angle range (in degrees) when randomly choosing a new direction.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.snacking
content: Allows the mob to take a load off and snack on food that it found nearby.

rows.Name: items
rows.Description: Items that we are interested in snacking on

rows.Name: snacking_cooldown
rows.Description: The cooldown time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again

rows.Name: snacking_cooldown_min
rows.Description: The minimum time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again

rows.Name: snacking_stop_chance
rows.Description: This is the chance that the mob will stop snacking, from 0 to 1

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.sneeze
content: Allows the mob to stop and sneeze possibly startling nearby mobs and dropping an item.

rows.Name: cooldown_time
rows.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

rows.Name: drop_item_chance
rows.Description: The probability that the mob will drop an item when it sneezes.

rows.Name: entity_types
Description: List of entity types this mob will startle (cause to jump) when it sneezes.

rows.Name: cooldown
rows.Description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

rows.Name: max_dist
rows.Description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

rows.Name: must_see
rows.Description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

rows.Name: must_see_forget_duration
rows.Description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

rows.Name: reevaluate_description
rows.Description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

rows.Name: sprint_speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

rows.Name: walk_speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

rows.Name: loot_table
rows.Description: Loot table to select dropped items from.

rows.Name: prepare_sound
rows.Description: Sound to play when the sneeze is about to happen.

rows.Name: prepare_time
rows.Description: The time in seconds that the mob takes to prepare to sneeze (while the prepare_sound is playing).

rows.Name: probability
rows.Description: The probability of sneezing. A value of 1.00 is 100%

rows.Name: sound
rows.Description: Sound to play when the sneeze occurs.

rows.Name: within_radius
rows.Description: Distance in blocks that mobs will be startled.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.sniff (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within "sniffing_radius" and update its "minecraft:suspect_tracking" component state

rows.Name: cooldown_range
rows.Description: Cooldown range between sniffs in seconds

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: Sniffing duration in seconds

rows.Name: sniffing_radius
rows.Description: Mob detection radius

rows.Name: suspicion_radius_horizontal
rows.Description: Mob suspicion horizontal radius. When a player is within this radius horizontally, the anger level towards that player is increased

rows.Name: suspicion_radius_vertical
rows.Description: Mob suspicion vertical radius. When a player is within this radius vertically, the anger level towards that player is increased

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.sonic_boom (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows this entity to perform a 'sonic boom' ranged attack

rows.Name: attack_cooldown
rows.Description: Cooldown in seconds required after using this attack until the entity can use sonic boom again.

rows.Name: attack_damage
rows.Description: Attack damage of the sonic boom.

rows.Name: attack_range_horizontal
rows.Description: Horizontal range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target.

rows.Name: attack_range_vertical
rows.Description: Vertical range (in blocks) at which the sonic boom can damage the target.

rows.Name: attack_sound
rows.Description: Sound event for the attack.

rows.Name: charge_sound
rows.Description: Sound event for the charge up.

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: Goal duration in seconds

rows.Name: duration_until_attack_sound
rows.Description: Duration in seconds until the attack sound is played.

rows.Name: knockback_height_cap
rows.Description: Height cap of the attack knockback's vertical delta.

rows.Name: knockback_horizontal_strength
rows.Description: Horizontal strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target.

rows.Name: knockback_vertical_strength
rows.Description: Vertical strength of the attack's knockback applied to the attack target.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.squid_dive
content: Allows the squid to dive down in water. Can only be used by the Squid.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.squid_flee
content: Allows the squid to swim away. Can only be used by the Squid.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.squid_idle
content: Allows the squid to swim in place idly. Can only be used by the Squid.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.squid_move_away_from_ground
content: Allows the squid to move away from ground blocks and back to water. Can only be used by the Squid.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.squid_out_of_water
content: Allows the squid to stick to the ground when outside water. Can only be used by the Squid.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.stalk_and_pounce_on_target
content: Allows a mob to stalk a target, then once within range pounce onto a target, on success the target will be attacked dealing damage defined by the attack component. On failure, the mob will risk getting stuck

rows.Name: interest_time
rows.Description: The amount of time the mob will be interested before pouncing. This happens when the mob is within range of pouncing

rows.Name: leap_distance
rows.Description: The distance in blocks the mob jumps in the direction of its target

rows.Name: leap_height
rows.Description: The height in blocks the mob jumps when leaping at its target

rows.Name: max_stalk_dist
rows.Description: The maximum distance away a target can be before the mob gives up on stalking

rows.Name: pounce_max_dist
rows.Description: The maximum distance away from the target in blocks to begin pouncing at the target

rows.Name: set_persistent
rows.Description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

rows.Name: stalk_speed
rows.Description: The movement speed in which you stalk your target

rows.Name: strike_dist
rows.Description: The max distance away from the target when landing from the pounce that will still result in damaging the target

rows.Name: stuck_time
rows.Description: The amount of time the mob will be stuck if they fail and land on a block they can be stuck on

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.stay_near_noteblock (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

rows.Name: listen_time
rows.Description: Sets the time an entity should stay near a noteblock after hearing it.

rows.Name: speed
rows.Description: Sets the entity's speed when moving toward the block.

rows.Name: start_distance
rows.Description: Sets the distance the entity needs to be away from the block to attempt to start the goal.

rows.Name: stop_distance
rows.Description: Sets the distance from the block the entity will attempt to reach.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.stay_while_sitting
content: Allows the mob to stay put while it is in a sitting state instead of doing something else.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.stomp_attack
content: Allows an entity to attack using stomp AoE damage behavior.

rows.Name: attack_once
rows.Description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

rows.Name: attack_types
rows.Description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

rows.Name: can_spread_on_fire
rows.Description: If the entity is on fire, this allows the entity's target to catch on fire after being hit.

rows.Name: cooldown_time
rows.Description: Cooldown time (in seconds) between attacks.

rows.Name: inner_boundary_time_increase
rows.Description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

rows.Name: max_path_time
rows.Description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

rows.Name: min_path_time
rows.Description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

rows.Name: no_damage_range_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplied with the final AoE damage range to determine a no damage range. The stomp attack will go on cooldown if target is in this no damage range.

rows.Name: on_attack
rows.Description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

rows.Name: on_kill
rows.Description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity kills the target.

rows.Name: outer_boundary_time_increase
rows.Description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

rows.Name: path_fail_time_increase
rows.Description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

rows.Name: path_inner_boundary
rows.Description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

rows.Name: path_outer_boundary
rows.Description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

rows.Name: random_stop_interval
rows.Description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

rows.Name: reach_multiplier
rows.Description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

rows.Name: require_complete_path
rows.Description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

rows.Name: stomp_range_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplied with the base size of the entity to determine stomp AoE damage range.

rows.Name: track_target
rows.Description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

rows.Name: x_max_rotation
rows.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

rows.Name: y_max_head_rotation
rows.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.stomp_turtle_egg
content: Allows this mob to stomp turtle eggs

rows.Name: goal_radius
rows.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

rows.Name: interval
rows.Description: A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal

rows.Name: search_height
rows.Description: Height in blocks the mob will look for turtle eggs to move towards

rows.Name: search_range
rows.Description: The distance in blocks it will look for turtle eggs to move towards

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.stroll_towards_village
content: Allows the mob to move into a random location within a village within the search range.

rows.Name: cooldown_time
rows.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

rows.Name: goal_radius
rows.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

rows.Name: search_range
rows.Description: The distance in blocks to search for points inside villages. If <= 0, find the closest village regardless of distance.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

rows.Name: start_chance
rows.Description: This is the chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.summon_entity
content: Allows the mob to attack the player by summoning other entities.

rows.Name: summon_choices
Description: List of spells for the mob to use to summon entities. Each spell has the following parameters:

rows.Name: cast_duration
rows.Description: Time in seconds the spell casting will take

rows.Name: cooldown_time
rows.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the spell again

rows.Name: do_casting
rows.Description: If true, the mob will do the casting animations and render spell particles

rows.Name: max_activation_range
rows.Description: Upper bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell, must not be negative.

rows.Name: min_activation_range
rows.Description: Lower bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell, must not be negative.

rows.Name: particle_color
rows.Description: The color of the particles for this spell

rows.Name: sequence
Description: List of steps for the spell. Each step has the following parameters:

rows.Name: base_delay
rows.Description: Amount of time in seconds to wait before this step starts

rows.Name: delay_per_summon
rows.Description: Amount of time in seconds before each entity is summoned in this step

rows.Name: entity_lifespan
rows.Description: Amount of time in seconds that the spawned entity will be alive for. A value of -1.0 means it will remain alive for as long as it can

rows.Name: entity_type
rows.Description: The entity type of the entities we will spawn in this step

rows.Name: num_entities_spawned
rows.Description: Number of entities that will be spawned in this step

rows.Name: shape
rows.Description: The base shape of this step. Valid values are circle and line

rows.Name: size
rows.Description: The base size of the entity

rows.Name: sound_event
rows.Description: The sound event to play for this step

rows.Name: summon_cap
rows.Description: Maximum number of summoned entities at any given time

rows.Name: summon_event
rows.Description: Event to invoke on each summoned entity on spawn

rows.Name: target
rows.Description: The target of the spell. This is where the spell will start (line will start here, circle will be centered here)

rows.Name: start_sound_event
rows.Description: The sound event to play when using this spell

rows.Name: weight
rows.Description: The weight of this spell. Controls how likely the mob is to choose this spell when casting one

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.swell
content: Allows the creeper to swell up when a player is nearby. It can only be used by Creepers.

rows.Name: start_distance
rows.Description: This mob starts swelling when a target is at least this many blocks away

rows.Name: stop_distance
rows.Description: This mob stops swelling when a target has moved away at least this many blocks

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.swim_idle (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows the entity go idle, if swimming. Entity must be in water.

rows.Name: idle_time
rows.Description: Amount of time (in seconds) to stay idle.

rows.Name: success_rate
rows.Description: Percent chance this entity will go idle, 1.0 = 100%.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.swim_up_for_breath (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows the mob to try to move to air once it is close to running out of its total breathable supply. Requires "minecraft:breathable".

rows.Name: material_type
rows.Description: The material the mob is traveling in. An air block will only be considered valid to move to with a block of this material below it. Options are: "water", "lava", or "any".

rows.Name: search_height
rows.Description: The height (in blocks) above the mob's current position that it will search for a valid air block to move to. If a valid block cannot be found, the mob will move to the position this many blocks above it.

rows.Name: search_radius
rows.Description: The radius (in blocks) around the mob's current position that it will search for a valid air block to move to.

rows.Name: speed_mod
rows.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this Goal.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.swim_wander (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows the entity to wander around while swimming, when not path-finding.

rows.Name: interval
rows.Description: Percent chance to start wandering, when not path-finding. 1 = 100%

rows.Name: look_ahead
rows.Description: Distance to look ahead for obstacle avoidance, while wandering.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when wandering.

rows.Name: wander_time
rows.Description: Amount of time (in seconds) to wander after wandering behavior was successfully started.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.swim_with_entity
content: Allows the entity follow another entity. Both entities must be swimming [ie, in water].

rows.Name: catch_up_multiplier
rows.Description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when matching another entity's direction.

rows.Name: catch_up_threshold
rows.Description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will speed up to reach that entity.

rows.Name: chance_to_stop
rows.Description: Percent chance to stop following the current entity, if they're riding another entity or they're not swimming. 1.0 = 100%

rows.Name: entity_types
rows.Description: Filters which types of entities are valid to follow.

rows.Name: match_direction_threshold
rows.Description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will try to match that entity's direction

rows.Name: search_range
rows.Description: Radius around this entity to search for another entity to follow.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when trying to catch up to the entity being followed.

rows.Name: state_check_interval
rows.Description: Time (in seconds) between checks to determine if this entity should catch up to the entity being followed or match the direction of the entity being followed.

rows.Name: stop_distance
rows.Description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will stop following that entity.

rows.Name: success_rate
rows.Description: Percent chance to start following another entity, if not already doing so. 1.0 = 100%

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.swoop_attack (See JSON Schema since 1.21.110)
content: Allows an entity to attack using swoop attack behavior; Ideal for use with flying mobs. The behavior ends if the entity has a horizontal collision or gets hit.

rows.Name: damage_reach
rows.Description: Added to the base size of the entity, to determine the target's maximum allowable distance, when trying to deal attack damage.

rows.Name: delay_range
rows.Description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (in seconds) between each attempted swoop attack.

rows.Name: speed_multiplier
rows.Description: During swoop attack behavior, this determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving toward the target.

rows.Name: affected_by_griefing_rule
rows.Description: If true, whether the goal is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

rows.Name: blocks
rows.Description: Block descriptors for which blocks are valid to be taken by the entity, if empty all blocks are valid.

rows.Name: can_take
rows.Description: Filters for if the entity should try to take a block. Self and Target are set.

rows.Name: chance
rows.Description: Chance each tick for the entity to try and take a block.

rows.Name: on_take
rows.Description: Trigger ran if the entity does take a block. Self, Target, and Block are set.

rows.Name: requires_line_of_sight
rows.Description: If true, whether the entity needs line of sight to the block they are trying to take.

rows.Name: xz_range
rows.Description: XZ range from which the entity will try and take blocks from.

rows.Name: y_range
rows.Description: Y range from which the entity will try and take blocks from.

sections.name: minecraft:behavior.take_flower
content: Allows the mob to accept flowers from another mob with the minecraft:offer_flower behavior.

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

rows.Name: max_head_rotation_y

rows.Description: The duration in seconds of Regeneration I added to the mob. Can also be set to "infinite"

sections.name: minecraft:conditional_bandwidth_optimization
content: Defines the Conditional Spatial Update Bandwidth Optimizations of this entity.

rows.Name: conditional_values
Description: The object containing the conditional bandwidth optimization values.

content: Conditions that must be met for these optimization values to be used.
In relation to the optimization value, determines the maximum ticks spatial update packets can be not sent.

The maximum distance considered during bandwidth optimizations. Any value below the max is interpolated to find optimization, and any value greater than or equal to this max results in max optimization.

When set to true, smaller motion packets will be sent during drop packet intervals, resulting in the same amount of packets being sent as without optimizations but with much less data being sent. This should be used when actors are travelling very quickly or teleporting to prevent visual oddities.

rows.Name: default_values
Description: The object containing the default bandwidth optimization values.

content: In relation to the optimization value, determines the maximum ticks spatial update packets can be not sent.

The maximum distance considered during bandwidth optimizations. Any value below the max is interpolated to find optimization, and any value greater than or equal to this max results in max optimization.

When set to true, smaller motion packets will be sent during drop packet intervals, resulting in the same amount of packets being sent as without optimizations but with much less data being sent. This should be used when actors are travelling very quickly or teleporting to prevent visual oddities.

sections.name: minecraft:custom_hit_test
content: List of hitboxes for melee and ranged hits against the entity.

rows.Name: hitboxes
rows.Description: Comma seperated list of hitboxes.

sections.name: minecraft:damage_over_time
content: Applies defined amount of damage to the entity at specified intervals.

rows.Name: damage_per_hurt
rows.Description: Amount of damage caused each hurt.

rows.Name: time_between_hurt
rows.Description: Time in seconds between damage.

sections.name: minecraft:damage_sensor
content: "Defines what events to call when this entity is damaged by specific entities or items.

rows.Name: triggers
Description: List of triggers with the events to call when taking specific kinds of damage."

rows.Name: cause
rows.Description: Type of damage that triggers the events.

rows.Name: damage_modifier
rows.Description: A modifier that adds/removes to the base damage received from the specified damage cause. It does not reduce damage to less than 0.

rows.Name: damage_multiplier
rows.Description: A multiplier that modifies the base damage received from the specified damage cause. If "deals_damage" is true the multiplier can only reduce the damage the entity will take to a minimum of 1.

rows.Name: deals_damage
rows.Description:
Defines how received damage affects the entity:                                          
- "yes", received damage is applied to the entity.                                          
- "no", received damage is not applied to the entity.                                          
- "no_but_side_effects_apply", received damage is not applied to the entity, but the side effects of the attack are. This means that the attacker's weapon loses durability, enchantment side effects are applied, and so on.

rows.Name: on_damage
rows.Description: Defines which entities the trigger applies to, and which, if any, event to emit when damaged.

rows.Name: on_damage_sound_event
rows.Description: Defines what sound to play, if any, when the "on_damage" filters are met.

sections.name: minecraft:dash_action
content: Ability for a rideable entity to dash.

rows.Name: can_dash_underwater
rows.Description: Whether the entity can dash underwater. Default value is false.

rows.Name: cooldown_time
rows.Description: The dash cooldown in seconds. Default value is 1.000000.

rows.Name: direction
rows.Description: Should the momentum be applied in the direction of the 'entity' or 'passenger'. When 'entity' is used the momentum is applied horizontally according to the direction the entity is looking, using only the entity's yaw. When 'passenger' is used the momentum will be applied in the direction the controlling passenger is looking, using the passenger's pitch and yaw.

rows.Name: horizontal_momentum
rows.Description: Horizontal momentum of the dash.

rows.Name: vertical_momentum
rows.Description: Vertical momentum of the dash.

sections.name: minecraft:despawn
content: Despawns the Actor when the despawn rules or optional filters evaluate to true.

rows.Name: despawn_from_chance
rows.Description: Determines if "min_range_random_chance" is used in the standard despawn rules

rows.Name: despawn_from_distance
Description: Specifies if the "min_distance" and "max_distance" are used in the standard despawn rules.

rows.Name: max_distance
rows.Description: maximum distance for standard despawn rules to instantly despawn the mob.

rows.Name: min_distance
rows.Description: minimum distance for standard despawn rules to try to despawn the mob.

rows.Name: despawn_from_inactivity
rows.Description: Determines if the "min_range_inactivity_timer" is used in the standard despawn rules.

rows.Name: despawn_from_simulation_edge
rows.Description: Determines if the mob is instantly despawned at the edge of simulation distance in the standard despawn rules.

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: The list of conditions that must be satisfied before the Actor is despawned. If a filter is defined then standard despawn rules are ignored.

rows.Name: min_range_inactivity_timer
rows.Description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob must be inactive.

rows.Name: min_range_random_chance
rows.Description: A random chance between 1 and the given value.

rows.Name: remove_child_entities
rows.Description: If true, all entities linked to this entity in a child relationship (eg. leashed) will also be despawned.

sections.name: minecraft:dimension_bound
content: Prevents the entity from changing dimension through portals.

sections.name: minecraft:drying_out_timer
content: Adds a timer for drying out that will count down and fire 'dried_out_event' or will stop as soon as the entity will get under rain or water and fire 'stopped_drying_out_event'

rows.Name: dried_out_event
rows.Description: Event to fire when the drying out time runs out.

rows.Name: recover_after_dried_out_event
rows.Description: Event to fire when entity was already dried out but received increase in water supply.

rows.Name: stopped_drying_out_event
rows.Description: Event to fire when entity stopped drying out, for example got into water or under rain.

rows.Name: total_time
rows.Description: Amount of time in seconds to dry out fully.

rows.Name: water_bottle_refill_time
rows.Description: Optional amount of additional time in seconds given by using splash water bottle on entity.

sections.name: minecraft:economy_trade_table
content: Defines this entity's ability to trade with players.

rows.Name: convert_trades_economy
rows.Description: Determines when the mob transforms, if the trades should be converted when the new mob has a economy_trade_table. When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

rows.Name: cured_discount
rows.Description: How much should the discount be modified by when the player has cured the Zombie Villager. Can be specified as a pair of numbers (When use_legacy_price_formula is true this is the low-tier trade discount and high-tier trade discount, otherwise it is the minor positive gossip and major positive gossip.)

rows.Name: display_name
rows.Description: Name to be displayed while trading with this entity

rows.Name: hero_demand_discount
rows.Description: Used in legacy prices to determine how much should Demand be modified by when the player has the Hero of the Village mob effect

rows.Name: max_cured_discount
rows.Description: The max the discount can be modified by when the player has cured the Zombie Villager. Can be specified as a pair of numbers (When use_legacy_price_formula is true this is the low-tier trade discount and high-tier trade discount, otherwise it is the minor positive gossip and major positive gossip.)

rows.Name: max_nearby_cured_discount
rows.Description: The max the discount can be modified by when the player has cured a nearby Zombie Villager. Only used when use_legacy_price_formula is true, otherwise max_cured_discount (low) is used.

rows.Name: nearby_cured_discount
rows.Description: How much should the discount be modified by when the player has cured a nearby Zombie Villager

rows.Name: new_screen
rows.Description: Used to determine if trading with entity opens the new trade screen

rows.Name: persist_trades
rows.Description: Determines if the trades should persist when the mob transforms. This makes it so that the next time the mob is transformed to something with a trade_table or economy_trade_table, then it keeps their trades.

rows.Name: show_trade_screen
rows.Description: Show an in game trade screen when interacting with the mob.

rows.Name: table
rows.Description: File path relative to the resource pack root for this entity's trades

rows.Name: use_legacy_price_formula
rows.Description: Determines whether the legacy formula is used to determines the trade prices.

sections.name: minecraft:entity_armor_equipment_slot_mapping
content: It defines to which armor slot an item equipped to 'minecraft:equippable''s second slot should be equipped to. It is automatically applied to all entities for worlds with a version greater than or equal to 1.21.10. For older worlds, 'slot.armor.torso' will be used. It is strongly advised not to explicitly use this component, as no backwards compatibility for it will be provided.

rows.Name: armor_slot
rows.Description: The armor slot an item equipped to 'minecraft:equippable''s second slot should be equipped to. It defaults to 'slot.armor.torso' for entities with a format version prior to 1.21.10, and to 'slot.armor.body' otherwise.

sections.name: minecraft:entity_sensor
content: A component that owns multiple subsensors, each one firing an event when a set of conditions are met by other entities within the defined range.

rows.Name: find_players_only
rows.Description: Limits the search to Players only for all subsensors.

rows.Name: relative_range
rows.Description: If true the subsensors' range is additive on top of the entity's size.

rows.Name: subsensors
Description: The list of subsensors which sense for entities and emit events when all their conditions are met.

rows.Name: cooldown
rows.Description: How many seconds should elapse before the subsensor can once again sense for entities. The cooldown is applied on top of the base 1 tick (0.05 seconds) delay. Negative values will result in no cooldown being used.

rows.Name: event
rows.Description: Event to fire when the conditions are met.

rows.Name: event_filters
rows.Description: The set of conditions that must be satisfied to fire the event.

rows.Name: maximum_count
rows.Description: The maximum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

rows.Name: minimum_count
rows.Description: The minimum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

rows.Name: range
rows.Description: The maximum horizontal and vertical distance another entity can be from this and have the filters checked against it.

rows.Name: require_all
rows.Description: If true requires all nearby entities to pass the filter conditions for the events to send.

rows.Name: y_offset
rows.Description: Vertical offset applied to the entity's position when computing the distance from other entities.

sections.name: minecraft:environment_sensor
content: Creates a trigger based on environment conditions.

rows.Name: triggers
rows.Description: The list of triggers that fire when the environment conditions match the given filter criteria.

sections.name: minecraft:equip_item
content: The entity puts on the desired equipment.

rows.Name: excluded_items
rows.Description: List of items that the entity should not equip.

sections.name: minecraft:equippable
content: Defines an entity's behavior for having items equipped to it.

rows.Name: slots
Description: List of slots and the item that can be equipped.

rows.Name: accepted_items
rows.Description: The list of items that can go in this slot.

rows.Name: interact_text
rows.Description: Text to be displayed when the entity can be equipped with this item when playing with Touch-screen controls.

rows.Name: item
rows.Description: Identifier of the item that can be equipped for this slot.

rows.Name: on_equip
rows.Description: Event to trigger when this entity is equipped with this item.

rows.Name: on_unequip
rows.Description: Event to trigger when this item is removed from this entity.

rows.Name: slot
rows.Description: The slot number of this slot.

sections.name: minecraft:exhaustion_values
content: Defines how much exhaustion each player action should take.

rows.Name: attack
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when attacking.

rows.Name: damage
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when taking damage.

rows.Name: heal
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when healed through food regeneration.

rows.Name: jump
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when jumping.

rows.Name: mine
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when mining.

rows.Name: sprint
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when sprinting.

rows.Name: sprint_jump
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when sprint jumping.

rows.Name: swim
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when swimming.

rows.Name: walk
rows.Description: Amount of exhaustion applied when walking.

rows.Name: on_bred
rows.Description: A Molang expression defining the amount of experience rewarded when this entity is successfully bred. An array of expressions adds each expression's result together for a final total.

rows.Name: on_death
rows.Description: A Molang expression defining the amount of experience rewarded when this entity dies. An array of expressions adds each expression's result together for a final total.

sections.name: minecraft:explode
content: Defines how the entity explodes.

rows.Name: allow_underwater
rows.Description: If true, the explosion will affect blocks and entities under water.

rows.Name: breaks_blocks
rows.Description: If true, the explosion will destroy blocks in the explosion radius.

rows.Name: causes_fire
rows.Description: If true, blocks in the explosion radius will be set on fire.

rows.Name: damage_scaling
rows.Description: A scale factor applied to the explosion's damage to entities. A value of 0 prevents the explosion from dealing any damage. Negative values cause the explosion to heal entities instead.

rows.Name: destroy_affected_by_griefing
rows.Description: If true, whether the explosion breaks blocks is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

rows.Name: fire_affected_by_griefing
rows.Description: If true, whether the explosion causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

rows.Name: fuse_length
rows.Description: The range for the random amount of time the fuse will be lit before exploding, a negative value means the explosion will be immediate.

rows.Name: fuse_lit
rows.Description: If true, the fuse is already lit when this component is added to the entity.

rows.Name: knockback_scaling
rows.Description: A scale factor applied to the knockback force caused by the explosion.

rows.Name: max_resistance
rows.Description: A blocks explosion resistance will be capped at this value when an explosion occurs.

rows.Name: negates_fall_damage
rows.Description: Defines whether the explosion should apply fall damage negation to Players above the point of collision.

rows.Name: particle_effect
rows.Description: The name of the particle effect to use. The accepted strings are 'explosion', 'wind_burst', or 'breeze_wind_burst'.

rows.Name: power
rows.Description: The radius of the explosion in blocks and the amount of damage the explosion deals.

rows.Name: sound_effect
rows.Description: The name of the sound effect played when the explosion triggers.

rows.Name: toggles_blocks
rows.Description: If true, the explosion will toggle blocks in the explosion radius.

sections.name: minecraft:flocking
content: Allows entities to flock in groups in water or not.

rows.Name: block_distance
rows.Description: The amount of blocks away the entity will look at to push away from.

rows.Name: block_weight
rows.Description: The weight of the push back away from blocks.

rows.Name: breach_influence
rows.Description: The amount of push back given to a flocker that breaches out of the water.

rows.Name: cohesion_threshold
rows.Description: The threshold in which to start applying cohesion.

rows.Name: cohesion_weight
rows.Description: The weight applied for the cohesion steering of the flock.

rows.Name: goal_weight
rows.Description: The weight on which to apply on the goal output.

rows.Name: high_flock_limit
rows.Description: Determines the high bound amount of entities that can be allowed in the flock.

rows.Name: in_water
rows.Description: Tells the Flocking Component if the entity exists in water.

rows.Name: influence_radius
rows.Description: The area around the entity that allows others to be added to the flock.

rows.Name: innner_cohesion_threshold
rows.Description: The distance in which the flocker will stop applying cohesion.

rows.Name: loner_chance
rows.Description: The percentage chance between 0-1 that a fish will spawn and not want to join flocks. Invalid values will be capped at the end points.

rows.Name: low_flock_limit
rows.Description: Determines the low bound amount of entities that can be allowed in the flock.

rows.Name: match_variants
rows.Description: Tells the flockers that they can only match similar entities that also match the variant, mark variants, and color data of the other potential flockers.

rows.Name: max_height
rows.Description: The max height allowable in the air or water.

rows.Name: min_height
rows.Description: The min height allowable in the air or water.

rows.Name: separation_threshold
rows.Description: The distance that is determined to be to close to another flocking and to start applying separation.

rows.Name: separation_weight
rows.Description: The weight applied to the separation of the flock.

rows.Name: use_center_of_mass
rows.Description: Tells the flockers that they will follow flocks based on the center of mass.

sections.name: minecraft:free_camera_controlled
content: When configured as a rideable entity, the entity will be controlled using WASD controls and mouse to move in three dimensions.

rows.Name: backwards_movement_modifier
rows.Description: Modifies speed going backwards.

rows.Name: strafe_speed_modifier
rows.Description: Modifies the strafe speed.

sections.name: minecraft:game_event_movement_tracking
content: Allows an entity to emit `entityMove`, `swim` and `flap` game events, depending on the block the entity is moving through. It is added by default to every mob. Add it again to override its behavior.

rows.Name: emit_flap
rows.Description: If true, the `flap` game event will be emitted when the entity moves through air.

rows.Name: emit_move
rows.Description: If true, the `entityMove` game event will be emitted when the entity moves on ground or through a solid.

rows.Name: emit_swim
rows.Description: If true, the `swim` game event will be emitted when the entity moves through a liquid.

sections.name: minecraft:genetics
content: Defines the way a mob's genes and alleles are passed on to its offspring, and how those traits manifest in the child. Compatible parent genes are crossed together, the alleles are handed down from the parents to the child, and any matching genetic variants fire off JSON events to modify the child and express the traits.

rows.Name: genes
Description: The list of genes that this entity has and will cross with a partner during breeding.

rows.Name: allele_range
Description: The range of positive integer allele values for this gene. Spawned mobs will have a random number in this range assigned to them.

rows.Name: range_max
rows.Description: Upper bound of the allele values for this gene.

rows.Name: range_min
rows.Description: Lower bound of the allele values for this gene.

rows.Name: genetic_variants
Description: The list of genetic variants for this gene. These check for particular allele combinations and fire events when all of them are satisfied.

rows.Name: birth_event
rows.Description: Event to run when this mob is created and matches the allele conditions.

rows.Name: both_allele
rows.Description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with both. Can also be a range of integers.

rows.Name: either_allele
rows.Description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with either. Can also be a range of integers.

rows.Name: hidden_allele
rows.Description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's hidden allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

rows.Name: main_allele
rows.Description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's main allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

rows.Name: mutation_rate
rows.Description: If this value is non-negative, overrides the chance for this gene that an allele will be replaced with a random one instead of the parent's allele during birth. Non-negative values greater than `1` will be the same as the value `1`.

rows.Name: name
rows.Description: The name of the gene.

rows.Name: mutation_rate
rows.Description: Chance that an allele will be replaced with a random one instead of the parent's allele during birth.

sections.name: minecraft:giveable
content: Defines sets of items that can be used to trigger events when used on this entity. The item will also be taken and placed in the entity's inventory.

rows.Name: cooldown
rows.Description: An optional cool down in seconds to prevent spamming interactions.

rows.Name: items
rows.Description: The list of items that can be given to the entity to place in their inventory.

rows.Name: on_give
rows.Description: Event to fire when the correct item is given.

sections.name: minecraft:group_size
content: Keeps track of entity group size in the given radius.

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: The list of conditions that must be satisfied for other entities to be counted towards group size.

rows.Name: radius
rows.Description: Radius from center of entity.

sections.name: minecraft:grows_crop
content: Could increase crop growth when entity walks over crop

rows.Name: chance
rows.Description: Value between 0-1. Chance of success per tick.

rows.Name: charges
rows.Description: Number of charges

sections.name: minecraft:healable
content: Defines the interactions with this entity for healing it.

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: The filter group that defines the conditions for using this item to heal the entity.

rows.Name: force_use
rows.Description: Determines if item can be used regardless of entity being at full health.

rows.Name: items
Description: The array of items that can be used to heal this entity.

rows.Name: heal_amount
rows.Description: The amount of health this entity gains when fed this item.

rows.Name: item
rows.Description: Item identifier that can be used to heal this entity.

sections.name: minecraft:heartbeat
content: Defines the entity's heartbeat.

rows.Name: interval
rows.Description: A Molang expression defining the inter-beat interval in seconds. A value of zero or less means no heartbeat.

rows.Name: sound_event
rows.Description: Level sound event to be played as the heartbeat sound.

sections.name: minecraft:home
content: Saves a home position for when the the entity is spawned.

rows.Name: home_block_list
rows.Description: Optional list of blocks that can be considered a valid home. If no such block longer exists at that position,											the home restriction is removed. Example syntax: minecraft:sand. Not supported: minecraft:sand:1.

rows.Name: restriction_radius
rows.Description: Optional radius that the entity will be restricted to in relation to its home.

rows.Name: restriction_type
rows.Description:
Defines how the the entity will be restricted to its home position. The possible values are:												
- "none", which poses no restriction.												
- "random_movement", which restricts randomized movement to be around the home position.												
- "all_movement", which restricts any kind of movement to be around the home position.													However, entities that somehow got too far away from their home will always be able to move closer to it, if prompted to do so.

sections.name: minecraft:hurt_on_condition
content: Defines a set of conditions under which an entity should take damage.

rows.Name: damage_conditions
Description: List of damage conditions that when met can cause damage to the entity.

content: The kind of damage that is caused to the entity. Various armors and spells use this to determine if the entity is immune.

sections.name: minecraft:inside_block_notifier
content: Verifies whether the entity is inside any of the listed blocks.

rows.Name: block_list
rows.Description: List of blocks, with certain block states, that we are monitoring to see if the entity is inside.

sections.name: minecraft:insomnia
content: Adds a timer since last rested to see if phantoms should spawn.

rows.Name: days_until_insomnia
rows.Description: Number of days the mob has to stay up until the insomnia effect begins.

sections.name: minecraft:instant_despawn
content: Despawns the Actor immediately.

rows.Name: remove_child_entities
rows.Description: If true, all entities linked to this entity in a child relationship (eg. leashed) will also be despawned.

sections.name: minecraft:interact
content: Defines interactions with this entity.

rows.Name: add_items
Description: Loot table with items to add to the player's inventory upon successful interaction.

rows.Name: table
rows.Description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

rows.Name: cooldown
rows.Description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with again.

rows.Name: cooldown_after_being_attacked
rows.Description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with after being attacked.

rows.Name: drop_item_slot
rows.Description: The entity's slot to remove and drop the item from, if any, upon successful interaction. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Equipment slots are denoted by 'slot.weapon.mainhand', 'slot.weapon.offhand', 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

rows.Name: drop_item_y_offset
rows.Description: Will offset the item drop position this amount in the y direction. Requires "drop_item_slot" to be specified.

rows.Name: equip_item_slot
rows.Description: The entity's slot to equip the item to, if any, upon successful interaction. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Equipment slots are denoted by 'slot.weapon.mainhand', 'slot.weapon.offhand', 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

rows.Name: health_amount
rows.Description: The amount of health this entity will recover or lose when interacting with this item. Negative values will harm the entity.

rows.Name: hurt_item
rows.Description: The amount of damage the item will take when used to interact with this entity. A value of 0 means the item won't lose durability.

rows.Name: interact_text
rows.Description: Text to show when the player is able to interact in this way with this entity when playing with touch-screen controls.

rows.Name: on_interact
rows.Description: Event to fire when the interaction occurs.

rows.Name: particle_on_start
Description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

content: Whether or not the particle will appear closer to who performed the interaction.
The type of particle that will be spawned.
Will offset the particle this amount in the y direction.

rows.Name: play_sounds

rows.Name: repair_entity_item

rows.Name: amount

rows.Name: slot
rows.Description: The entity's slot containing the item to be repaired. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Equipment slots are denoted by 'slot.weapon.mainhand', 'slot.weapon.offhand', 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

rows.Name: spawn_entities
rows.Description: List of entities to spawn when the interaction occurs.

rows.Name: spawn_items
Description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.

rows.Name: table
rows.Description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

rows.Name: y_offset
rows.Description: Will offset the items spawn position this amount in the y direction.

rows.Name: swing
rows.Description: If true, the player will do the 'swing' animation when interacting with this entity.

rows.Name: transform_to_item
rows.Description: The item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

rows.Name: use_item
rows.Description: If true, the interaction will use an item.

rows.Name: vibration
rows.Description: Vibration to emit when the interaction occurs. Admitted values are none (no vibration emitted), shear, entity_die, entity_act, entity_interact.

sections.name: minecraft:inventory
content: Defines this entity's inventory properties.

rows.Name: additional_slots_per_strength
rows.Description: Number of slots that this entity can gain per extra strength

rows.Name: can_be_siphoned_from
rows.Description: If true, the contents of this inventory can be removed by a hopper

rows.Name: container_type
rows.Description: Type of container this entity has. Can be horse, minecart_chest, chest_boat, minecart_hopper, inventory, container or hopper

rows.Name: inventory_size
rows.Description: Number of slots the container has

rows.Name: private
rows.Description: If true, the entity will not drop its inventory on death

rows.Name: restrict_to_owner
rows.Description: If true, the entity's inventory can only be accessed by its owner or itself

sections.name: minecraft:item_hopper
content: Determines that this entity is an item hopper.

sections.name: minecraft:jump.dynamic
content: Defines a dynamic type jump control that will change jump properties based on the speed modifier of the mob.

sections.name: minecraft:jump.static
content: Gives the entity the ability to jump.

rows.Name: jump_power
rows.Description: The initial vertical velocity for the jump

sections.name: minecraft:leashable
content: Allows this entity to be leashed and defines the conditions and events for this entity when is leashed.

rows.Name: can_be_cut
rows.Description: If true, players can cut both incoming and outgoing leashes by using shears on the entity.

rows.Name: can_be_stolen
rows.Description: If true, players can leash this entity even if it is already leashed to another entity.

rows.Name: on_leash
rows.Description: Event to call when this entity is leashed.

rows.Name: on_unleash
rows.Description: Event to call when this entity is unleashed.

rows.Name: on_unleash_interact_only
rows.Description: When set to true, "on_unleash" does not trigger when the entity gets unleashed for reasons other than the player directly interacting with it.

rows.Name: presets
Description: Defines how this entity behaves when leashed to another entity. The first preset which "filter" conditions are met will be applied; if none match, a default configuration is used instead.

rows.Name: filter
rows.Description: Conditions that must be met for this preset to be applied.

rows.Name: hard_distance
rows.Description: Distance (in blocks) over which the entity starts being pulled towards the leash holder with a spring-like force. Entities can enter and stay in vehicles if the leash is stretched under this distance, but will dismount once it exceeds it.

rows.Name: max_distance
rows.Description: Distance in blocks at which the leash breaks.

rows.Name: rotation_adjustment
rows.Description: Adjusts the rotation at which the entity reaches equilibrium, when "spring_type" is set to "dampened" or "quad_dampened".

rows.Name: soft_distance
rows.Description: Distance (in blocks) over which the entity starts pathfinding toward the leash holder, if able.

rows.Name: spring_type
rows.Description: Defines the type of spring-like force that pulls the entity towards its leash holder:- "bouncy": Simulates a highly elastic spring that never reaches an equilibrium if the leashed entity is suspended mid-air.- "dampened": Simulates a dampened spring attached to the front of the leashed entity's collision. It reaches an equilibrium if the entity is suspended mid-air and aligns with the movement direction.- "quad_dampened": Simulates four dampened springs connected to the center of each side of the entities' collisions. It reaches an equilibrium if the entity is suspended mid-air and gradually aligns with the leash holder over time.

sections.name: minecraft:leashable_to
content: Allows players to leash entities to this entity, retrieve entities already leashed to it, or free them using shears. For the last interaction to work, the leashed entities must have "can_be_cut" set to true in their "minecraft:leashable" component.

rows.Name: can_retrieve_from
rows.Description: Allows players to retrieve entities that are leashed to this entity.

sections.name: minecraft:looked_at
content: Defines the behavior when another entity looks at the owner entity.

rows.Name: field_of_view
rows.Description: Defines, in degrees, the width of the field of view for entities looking at the owner entity. If "scale_fov_by_distance" is set to true, this value corresponds to the field of view at a distance of one block between the entities.

rows.Name: filters
rows.Description: Defines which entities are considered when searching for entities looking at the owner entity.

rows.Name: find_players_only
rows.Description: Limits the search to only the nearest Player that meets the specified "filters" rather than all nearby entities.

rows.Name: line_of_sight_obstruction_type
rows.Description: Defines the type of block shape used to check for line of sight obstructions. Valid values: "outline", "collision", "collision_for_camera".

rows.Name: look_at_locations
rows.Description: A list of locations on the owner entity towards which line of sight checks are performed. At least one location must be unobstructed for the entity to be considered as looked at.

rows.Name: looked_at_cooldown
rows.Description: Specifies the range for the random number of seconds that must pass before the owner entity can check again for entities looking at it, after detecting an entity looking at it.

rows.Name: looked_at_event
rows.Description: Defines the event to trigger when an entity is detected looking at the owner entity.

rows.Name: min_looked_at_duration
rows.Description: Defines the minimum, continuous time the owner entity has to be looked at before being considered as such. Defaults to 0 if not explicitly specified.

rows.Name: not_looked_at_event
rows.Description: Defines the event to trigger when no entity is found looking at the owner entity.

rows.Name: scale_fov_by_distance
rows.Description: When true, the field of view narrows as the distance between the owner entity and the entity looking at it increases. This ensures that the width of the view cone remains somewhat constant towards the owner entity position, regardless of distance.

rows.Name: search_radius
rows.Description: Maximum distance the owner entity will search for entities looking at it.

rows.Name: set_target
rows.Description:
Defines if and how the owner entity will set entities that are looking at it as its combat targets. Valid values:                                          
- "never", looking entities are never set as targets, but events are emitted.                                          
- "once_and_stop_scanning", the first detected looking entity is set as target. Scanning and event emission is suspended if and until the owner entity has a target.                                          
- "once_and_keep_scanning", the first detected looking entity is set as target. Scanning and event emission continues.s

sections.name: minecraft:managed_wandering_trader
content: This component is used to implement part of the Wandering Trader behavior

sections.name: minecraft:mob_effect

rows.Description: Time in seconds to wait between each application of the effect.

rows.Name: effect_range
rows.Description: How close a hostile entity must be to have the mob effect applied.

rows.Name: effect_time
rows.Description: How long the applied mob effect lasts in seconds. Can also be set to "infinite"

rows.Name: entity_filter
rows.Description: The set of entities that are valid to apply the mob effect to.

rows.Name: mob_effect
rows.Description: The mob effect that is applied to entities that enter this entities effect range.

sections.name: minecraft:mob_effect_immunity
content: Entities with this component will have an immunity to the provided mob effects.

rows.Name: mob_effects
rows.Description: List of names of effects the entity is immune to.

rows.Name: max_turn

sections.name: minecraft:movement.jump

rows.Name: jump_delay
rows.Description: Delay after landing when using the slime move control.

rows.Name: max_turn
rows.Description: The maximum number in degrees the mob can turn per tick.

sections.name: minecraft:movement.skip
content: This move control causes the mob to hop as it moves.

rows.Name: max_turn

sections.name: minecraft:movement.sway

rows.Name: sway_amplitude
rows.Description: Strength of the sway movement.

rows.Name: sway_frequency

sections.name: minecraft:nameable
content: Allows this entity to be named (e.g. using a name tag).

rows.Name: allow_name_tag_renaming
rows.Description: If true, this entity can be renamed with name tags

rows.Name: always_show
rows.Description: If true, the name will always be shown

rows.Name: default_trigger
rows.Description: Trigger to run when the entity gets named

rows.Name: name_actions
Description: Describes the special names for this entity and the events to call when the entity acquires those names

rows.Name: name_filter
rows.Description: List of special names that will cause the events defined in 'on_named' to fire

rows.Name: on_named
rows.Description: Event to be called when this entity acquires the name specified in 'name_filter'

sections.name: minecraft:peek
content: Defines the entity's 'peek' behavior, defining the events that should be called during it.
